General.Name: iVestos AG
General.Description: iVestos AG is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in incubation, seed/startup, early venture, mid venture and growth capital. It prefers to invest in financial service sector, payment processing, real estate, building, construction and Internet applications. It typically invests in listed and unlisted companies based in Germany. The firm invests between "0.5 million ($0.55 million) to "50 million ($55.03 million) in equity in companies with enterprise value between "0.5 million ($0.55 million) and "50 million ($55.03 million). It invests through its personal capital and makes balance sheet investments. The firm was formerly known as Afendis Payment AG. iVestos AG was founded in August 2001 and is based in Pullach, Germany.

0.Name: Mr. Georg  Gabrielides Dipl.-Ing.
